name: toggle_hitbox
description: If `true`, allows this <%=tile%> to be hit by <%=spell%>s.
Otherwise, it cannot be affected by any <%=spell%>s.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.desc: `true`, if this <%=doc_class_name%> should be able to be affected by <%=spell%>s.

text: Toggling the hitbox **off** (`false`), also stops them from being included by certain functions.
